page.title: 10Land Usage and Markets used
page.content: This chart shows how the land is used on the 14 farms in this area.The mean acreage is worked out using only those farms having the particular land usage in question.Mean,maximum and total figures are in acres. { NO.OF MEAN { USAGE FARMS ACREAGE MAXIMUM TOTAL {-------------------------------------- Arable: 4 53 160 210 { Silage: 9 107 220 970 Woods: 6 24 120 143 { Hay: 5 14 25 68 Grazing: 9 52 130 464 {-------------------------------------- { MARKETS Market No.of farms using market { BEESTON: 10 CREWE: 12 { CLEDFORD:} {1 BIRMINGHAM: 1
